scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode started...'   && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./src/output.css && open ./src/index.html && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./src/output.css --watch
scripts.build: echo 'Creating production build...' && rm -rf ./_build && mkdir _build && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./src/output.css && cp ./src/** ./_build/
